roleset.name: not able to be reached, gotten
roleset.note: Added by Julia based on BOLT-2,3, relation to attainable.01.

example.name: arg1
example.text: A lot of the nuclear weapons tech that-1 [*-1] was unattainabe 20 - 30 years ago is attaintable now . It would be very expensive , and there would be consequences .
